title: "Security Group Support for Log Analytics Integration (Preview)"
excerpt: "AD Security Group support is now available for Log Analytics for Premium workspaces. This allows Tenant administrators to control which Workspace admins can use the Log Analytics integration to log activities from their Power BI workspace."
